labyrinth

Interface Movable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovingMonster, Player

    public interface Movable
    Interface that describes an object that can move or be moved.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position calcNewPosition(Direction dir)
      Calculate new position of the object, if it would move in given position.
      Position getPosition()
      Get current position of the object.
      void goToPosition(Position pos)
      Go to given position.

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Get current position of the object.
        Returns:
        current position of the object

      • calcNewPosition

        Position calcNewPosition(Direction dir)
        Calculate new position of the object, if it would move in given position. But do not update actual position of the object.
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to move
        Returns:
        new position after moving in given direction

      • goToPosition

        void goToPosition(Position pos)
        Go to given position. Actual position of the object should be replaced with given one.
        Parameters:
        pos - position to move to.
